SYSLOG - Update

PUT Cisco-IOS-XR-infra-syslog-cfg:syslog/

Update operation of resource: syslog

syslog_schema

syslogbody object

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {
syslogPUTPOSTDELETEGET
    : {
Configure logging file destinationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
        {
          : {
Specifications of the logging file destinationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
            
"max-file-size": "integer", Maximum file size (in KB)
default: "1024"

            
"path": "string", File path

            
"severity": "integer" Severity for the logging host
default: "6"

          },
          : {
Set File logging discriminatorsPUTPOSTDELETEGET
            
"nomatch1": "string", Set monitor logging no-match1 discriminator

            
"nomatch2": "string", Set monitor logging no-match2 discriminator

            
"nomatch3": "string", Set monitor logging no-match3 discriminator

            
"match3": "string", Set monitor logging match3 discriminator

            
"match2": "string", Set monitor logging match2 discriminator

            
"match1": "string" Set monitor logging match1 discriminator

          },
          
"file-name": "string" Name of the file

        }
      ]
    },
    : {
Set buffered logging parametersPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      : {
Set buffered logging discriminatorsPUTPOSTDELETEGET
        
"nomatch1": "string", Set monitor logging no-match1 discriminator
